tool.name: pepwheel

param.name: steps
param.label: Steps, the number of residues plotted per turn is this value divided by the 'turns' value

param.name: turns
param.label: Turns, the number of residues plotted per turn is the 'steps' value divided by this value

param.name: amphipathic
param.label: If this is true then the residues ACFGILMVWY are marked as squares and all other residues are unmarked. This overrides any other markup that you may have specified
